column4: anyone here know how to do multiline regexp matches using the ubuntu "expect" command?  This regexp isn't working:  (\n|.)*e is 65537
ubuntu 'expect'?    I don't have it, soooo ^_^, I do know regexps, and usually there's a 'multiline' switch you pass, otherwise the '.' doesn't include \n
there's a nice regex editor/tester for regex, 'kodos', is in the repos
I tried one regexp tool, but it turns out that "expect" uses a funky version of regexp
